title: konji konji
sahitya:
konji konji vA guhanE muruganE


anupallavi

  anjal anjal enavE shenjOr shalangai konja tanja padam peyarndEn nenjam magizhndiDavE


caraNam    pinju maDiyaNinda shen shaDai Ishanum anjana maNi nIla manjinum umaiyALum 
konji mmagizh kumarA anjuDar vaDivElA tanjam unai aDaindEn minjiya anbODu
